name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro
desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

value.text: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

value.name: Ricetta: stufato di persico a dorso scuro
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Black-Back Perch Stew.

value.name: Pesce
value.desc: Un filetto di pesce fresco. Se trattato in modo appropriato, può diventare un piatto prelibato.

value.name: Peperoncino di Jueyun
value.desc: Un pianta piccante nativa di Liyue. Basta annusarlo per provare caldo e sete.

value.name: Sale
value.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

value.name: Campaviola
value.desc:
Un fiorellino dalla grande vitalità. Si dice che la sua forma protesa verso il basso riesca a
conservarne il profumo più a lungo.

value.name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro delizioso
value.desc: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable that when you swallow a piece down, you just have to treat yourself to another.

value.name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro sospetto
value.desc: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of the fish itself to the spicy taste of the chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.

value.name: Xiangling
value.desc: Una cuoca rinomata di Liyue. Nutre una grande passione per la cucina ed eccelle nella preparazione di piatti piccanti e speziati.

value.name: Pesce bollito del Ristorante Wanmin
value.desc: Xiangling's specialty. This is the signature dish of the Wanmin Restaurant, combining Xiangling's heartfelt passion for cuisine. Anyone who tastes it will gain a pure appreciation for gourmet food amid the hearty and addictive blend of flavors.
